channel.title: detection on ROP-Lobsters
channel.description: Recent content in detection on ROP-Lobsters

item.title: #1: Signature-Based Detection, Weak Hashes, TikTok Malware, and More!
item.description: ROP-E1: HTML5 Audio ^ Austin and Nathan rant about the failings of signature based detection, explore the impact of weak hashing algorithms, discuss proposed requirements to add cybersecurity experts to corporate boards, the success of TikTok malware, and more!
